block.p: DISTRICT 1 -- Battery Park, TriBeCa. Next meeting Feb. 20, 5:30 P.M. Stuyvesant High School, 345 Chambers Street and West Street; (212) 442-5050. Agenda:T.B.A.
DISTRICT 1 -- Battery Park, TriBeCa. Next meeting Feb. 20, 5:30 P.M. Stuyvesant High School, 345 Chambers Street and West Street; (212) 442-5050. Agenda:T.B.A.

DISTRICT 2 -- SoHo, Little Italy, West Village, Greenwich Village, parts of Chinatown. Next meeting Thursday, 7 P.M.; Cronin Auditorium, St. Vincent's Hospital, Seventh Ave. and West 11th Street; (212) 979-2272. Agenda: T.B.A.
DISTRICT 3 -- Lower East Side, East Village. Next meeting Feb. 27, 6:30 P.M.; Public School 20, 166 Essex Street; (212) 533-5300. Agenda: T.B.A.

DISTRICT 4 -- Chelsea, Clinton. Next meeting March 6, 7 P.M.; St. Luke's Roosevelt Hospital Center, Meade Educational Conference Center, 1000 10th Avenue, between 58th and 59th Streets,; (212) 736-4536. Agenda: T.B.A.

DISTRICT 5 -- Central Park South, central business district, theater district, Flatiron district, garment district, Little India, Rockefeller Center. Next meeting March 14, 6 P.M.; Fashion Institute of Technology, 227 West 27th Street; (212) 465-0907. Agenda: T.B.A.

DISTRICT 6 -- Murray Hill, Turtle Bay, Gramercy Park, Stuyvesant Square, Stuyvesant Town, Peter Cooper Village, Beekman, Sutton. Next meeting Wednesday, 7 P.M.; New York University Medical Center, 550 First Avenue at 31st Street; (212) 679-0907. Agenda: T.B.A.
DISTRICT 7 -- Upper West Side. Next meeting March 5, 7 P.M.; Gorddard-Riverside Community Center, 593 Columbus Avenue, at 88th Street ; (212) 362-4008. Agenda: T.B.A.
DISTRICT 8 -- Upper East Side, Yorkville, Roosevelt Island. Next meeting Feb. 21, 7 P.M.; Rockefeller University, Caspary auditorium, 1230 York Avenue; (212) 427-4840. Agenda: T.B.A.
DISTRICT 9 -- Morningside Heights, Manhattanville, Hamilton Heights. Next meeting Thursday, 6:30 P.M.; Community Board Office, 565 West 125th Street, off Broadway; (212) 864-6200. Agenda: T.B.A.
DISTRICT 10 -- Central Harlem. Next meeting March 6, 6:30 P.M.; Adam Clayton Powell State Office Building, 2d Floor Art Gallery, 163 West 125th Street; (212) 749-3105. Agenda: T.B.A.
DISTRICT 12 -- Washington Heights, Inwood. Next meeting Feb. 27, 7:30 P.M.; New York State Psychiatric Institute, 8th Floor Auditorium, 722 West 168th Street; (212) 568-8500. Agenda: T.B.A.
Schedules for meetings of community boards in other boroughs will appear in subsequent issues.
